answers.answer: Every each  pregnancies are different. & swelling are pretty normal but if too much u should talk to your doc about the swelling coz sometimes leads to preeclampsia.
Yep. Goes away after birth. But u should get checked cos i think there is a syndrome that can make ur feet and hands swell except pregnancy.

Its normal, I am 38 weeks and 3 days and I have had my hands and feet swell up since my 36 week .its a lot and hurts but drink plenty of water and put your feet up as much as you can . after birth it will go away  (:
